quote.issuer_name: Chengdu SIWI Science and Technology Co. Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Chengdu SIWI Science and Technology Co. Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Chengdu SIWI Science and Technology Co Ltd is a China-based company primarily engaged in the technology research and development, product manufacturing, sales and service of electric wires and cables, optical fiber and cables and other information industrial products. The Company mainly operates its business through three segments. The Copper Cable, Cable Component Related Products segment is engaged in the production and sales of copper cables and cable components related products. The Optical Communication Products segment is engaged in the production and sales of optical fibers products. The Park Operation segment is engaged in the park operation business. The Company mainly conducts its business in the domestic market.
